query: Please doctors in the house, I born my twins at 33wks as preterm they're 4 months now and their weight is 3.5 and 3.3. Please what can I give them to gain weight?
Please doctors in the house, I gave birth to my twins at 34 weeks as preterm. They are now 4 months old, and their weight is 3.7 and 3.5. Please what can I give them to gain weight?

Please doctors in the house, I gave birth to my twins at 33 weeks as preterm. They are now 5 months old, and their weight is still 3.5 and 3.3. I'm very worried about their weight gain. Please what should I do?
My 10-month-old baby still refluxes from time to time. Do I need to worry? B.W. 3.9 [C.W. 10.5]
My 10-month-old baby still refluxes occasionally after feeding, especially when lying down. Do I need to worry? B.W. 3.9 [C.W. 10.7]
My 10-month-old baby vomits frequently after feeds and has been refusing food for the past few days. Do I need to be worried? B.W. 3.9 [C.W. 9.8]

Good morning Docs, I fed my 7-month-old baby with swallow and ogbono soup mixed with vegetables. But I noticed in his poo, there are vegetables when I changed his diaper. Does it mean that the food didn't digest properly? BW 3.5kg CW 9kg

Good morning Docs, I fed my 7-month-old baby with mashed potatoes and vegetable soup. But I noticed undigested bits of vegetables in his poo. Does it mean that the food didn't digest properly? BW 3.5kg CW 9.2kg

Good morning Docs, I fed my 7-month-old baby with rice and fish soup, but I noticed a strong foul smell in his poo, and he has been vomiting since yesterday. Does this mean the food didn't digest properly? BW 3.5kg CW 8.5kg

Good morning great paeds in the house. Please I want to know if feeding a baby of 7 months old, 4 times a day, 4-hour interval, which consists of pap, cereal, fruit puree, and homemade meal, breastfeeding inclusive, can be considered as overfeeding? Thanks BW 3kg 6-month W 6.9kg CW unknown

Good morning great paeds in the house. Please, I want to know if feeding a baby of 7 months old, 5 times a day at 3-hour intervals, which consists of pap, cereal, fruit puree, and homemade meal, breastfeeding inclusive, can be considered as overfeeding? BW 3kg 6-month W 7kg CW unknown
Good morning great paeds in the house. I feed my 7-month-old baby almost every hour, and he seems to vomit frequently. Could I be overfeeding him? BW 3kg 6-month W 7.5kg CW unknown
Good evening Dr, Please can I give orange to a 6+ month-old baby that is having hard stool? Thank you.
Good evening Dr, can I give orange juice to my 6+ month-old baby who is having mild constipation?
Good evening Dr, can I give orange juice to my 6+ month-old baby who has not had a bowel movement for five days and is straining a lot?
Hello pls doc I want to know when is the right time to start sitting baby with support B.w 3.0 [?]
Hello doc, I want to know when is the right time to start sitting a baby with support? My baby is 5 months old. B.W. 3.0
Hello doc, my baby is 7 months old but still cannot sit even with support. Is this normal? B.W. 3.0
Hello ATP, my baby's weight at birth is 2.9KG and she weighs 3.75KG @6weeks. We are on EBF. PLS IS THE WEIGHT NEED TO BE WORRY ABOUT. THANKS
Hello ATP, my baby's weight at birth was 2.9KG, and now at 6 weeks, she weighs 4KG. We are on EBF. Is this weight gain okay?
Hello ATP, my baby's weight at birth was 2.9KG, and now at 6 weeks, she weighs only 3.3KG. We are on EBF. Should I be worried?
